ComicInfo.Summary: A SHOW OF POWER! The Marauders set their sights on the power-dampening technology that seems to have made its way into far too many hands – most notably, the Russian Army. The Hellfire’s wrath with be swift and harsh.

ComicInfo.Title: Leave None to Tell the Tale
